data.description: ** MOTIVATED SELLER** BUILT-IN EQUITY FOR YOUR BENEFIT - THIS HOME IS CURRENTLY PRICED WELL BELOW MARKET VALUE**  Located 8 minutes from the Mall of Georgia, Gwinnett Park & Ride, Public Transportation, and walking distance to Lanier High School, the sought after Secret Cove subdivision is letting the secret out - THERE IS A GEM WAITING FOR YOU HERE! This well-maintained, 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home on large level lot with partially finished basement has it all! This home boasts a recently remodeled main floor with open spacious kitchen, built-in island stovetop, granite countertops, breakfast bar, spacious pantry, and plenty of windows to energize your comings and goings. Natural colors and laminate throughout - this home is ready to go! Family Room with fireplace has custom surround lighting. From there, find your way to a quaint screened-in porch, or enjoy entertaining guests on your large deck, overlooking the fenced-in backyard. Upgraded windows, exterior doors, furnace and water heater reassure you of this home's upkeep. Spacious bedrooms with walk-in closets to everyone's liking - sure to keep every family member happy. Not to mention, the very large laundry room with mud sink and plenty of cabinet space located on the same floor as all of the bedrooms - as it should be - for your family's convenience. Top Rated School District**Tons of festivals and community events hosted at City of Sugar Hill within 3 minutes** You're welcome!! =)**
